definition: famous name/your distinguished name/one's formal personal name
Daming county in Handan 邯鄲|邯郸[Han2 dan1], Hebei
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
Daming county in Handan 邯鄲|邯郸[Han2 dan1], Hebei
your name has been known to me for a long time (polite)
I have been looking forward to meeting you for a long time (idiom)

Five Sacred Mountains of the Daoists, namely: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong, Mt Hua 華山|华山[Hua4 Shan1] in Shaanxi, Mt Heng 衡山[Heng2 Shan1] in Hunan, Mt Heng 恆山|恒山[Heng2 Shan1] in Shanxi, Mt Song 嵩山[Song1 Shan1] in Henan

the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature, namely: A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4], Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], Water Margin 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4], Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]

sentences.english: May I have your name again,please.
Could I have your name please?
I took you fMr Green from the Customs just now. May I know your name?
sentences.chinese: 我刚才把你错当作海关的格林先生了。请问尊姓大名？

sentences.english: Mansions" is one of China's four famous book !"
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道“红楼梦”是中国的四大名著之一。

sentences.english: There's a great deal about Rick in Casablanca.
sentences.chinese: 在卡萨布兰卡里克的大名是如雷贯耳啊。

sentences.english: The Marquis de Montcalm was at that time a celebrated royalist .
sentences.chinese: 安静山侯爵是当时一个大名鼎鼎的保王党。

sentences.english: The famous passenger car, Sheng-Li (The Victory).
sentences.chinese: 鼎鼎大名的胜利号客车。

sentences.english: The man who achieved this influence was an unlikely candidate for such eminence.
sentences.chinese: 有这么大影响的人，未必一定会获得鼎鼎大名。

sentences.english: The famous actor now lives in seclusion.
sentences.chinese: 这位大名鼎鼎的演员现在深居简出了。

sentences.english: I have heard of you long ago.
Nice to meet you . I've heard a lot about you.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴认识您，久仰大名。

sentences.english: Nice to meet you . I’ve heard a lot about you.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴认识你，久仰大名。

sentences.english: The child would grow up to be Bacchus, the great god of wine.
sentences.chinese: 这个婴儿就是大名鼎鼎的酒神巴克斯。

sentences.english: B:Your name and your room number,please.
sentences.chinese: 请问尊姓大名和房间号码？

sentences.english: The name of the being you are calling, please?
sentences.chinese: 请问受话人的贵姓大名？

sentences.english: The marquis de montcalm was at that time a celebrated royalist.
sentences.chinese: 安静山侯爵是当时一个大名鼎鼎的保王党。

definition: lit. like thunder piercing the ear/a well-known reputation (idiom)
honorific: I've long looked forward to meeting you./It's an honor to meet you at last.
I have been looking forward to meeting you for a long time (idiom)
your name has been known to me for a long time (polite)
